quotes: Thus in 2003, he set up Alibaba’s subsidiary Taobao, which provided a platform for entrepreneurs and small businesses to sell to the Chinese market.
In 2003 he saw further potential in online payment systems and set up Alipay, which provided third-party payment transactions.
In 2005, Yahoo bought a 40% stake in the company, and in 2007, USD $1.7 billion dollars were raised in its first public offering in Hong Kong.
In 2005, Yahoo bought a 40% stake in the company, and in 2007, USD $1.7 billion dollars were raised in its first public offering in Hong Kong.
By 2007, Taobao had a market share of 67% and had solidified its unicorn status.
Alibaba’s IPO was the largest in US history in September 2014, raising USD $21.8 billion for the company and its investors.
In 2014, he set up the Jack Ma Foundation, focusing on entrepreneurship, education, women’s leadership, medical support and environmental protection.

organizations.name: Ant Group
quotes: It was also around this time that Alibaba’s Alipay was rebranded to Ant Group – China’s largest digital payment and money market companies serving over one billion users.

organizations.name: Jack Ma Foundation
quotes: In 2014, he set up the Jack Ma Foundation, focusing on entrepreneurship, education, women’s leadership, medical support and environmental protection.

organizations.name: Jack Ma Rural Education Initiative
quotes: As such, the foundation has set up and implemented the Jack Ma Rural Education Initiative, Jack Ma Education Fund, Africa Entrepreneur Prize Initiative, China National Women’s Soccer Team Support Program, as well as other environmental protection and medical support projects.
